pageProps.title: spacy-transformers
pageProps.teaser: spaCy pipelines for pretrained BERT, XLNet and GPT-2

data.title: spacy-transformers
data.slogan: spaCy pipelines for pretrained BERT, XLNet and GPT-2
data.description: This package provides spaCy model pipelines that wrap [Hugging Face's `transformers`](https://github.com/huggingface/transformers) package, so you can use them in spaCy. The result is convenient access to state-of-the-art transformer architectures, such as BERT, GPT-2, XLNet, etc.
code_example: doc = nlp("Apple shares rose on the news. Apple pie is delicious.")
data.author: Explosion
